00028 PlotTDiff::PlotTDiff(modules::options* opts):
00029    BaseModule("PlotTDiff",opts){    
00030   fDetNameA = opts->GetString("det1");
00031   fDetNameB = opts->GetString("det2");

00041 int PlotTDiff::BeforeFirstEntry(TGlobalData* gData,const TSetupData *setup){
00042   // Print extra info if we're debugging this module:
00043   if(Debug()){
00044     cout<<"-----PlotTDiff::BeforeFirstEntry(): I'm debugging!"<<endl;
00045   }
00046 
00047   //call my source finders and build histogram for each source with
00048   //a time component.
00049 
00050   //should I continue to work on just two? or should I have this loop 
00051   //through all pairs
00052 
00053   for(SourceAnalPulseMap::const_iterator sourceIt = gAnalysedPulseMap.begin();
00054       sourceIt != gAnalysedPulseMap.end(); sourceIt++)
00055     {
00056       //std::string fBankNameB = setup->GetBank(fDetNameB);
00057       if(Debug() && sourceIt->first.Channel() != fDetNameA)
00058         {
00059           cout << sourceIt->first.Channel() << "   " << fDetNameA << endl;
00060           continue;   //check for detector A
00061         }
00062 
00063       
00064       //I need to check that this source generates a time
00065       AnalysedPulseList pulses = sourceIt->second;
00066 
00067       
00068 
00069 
00070 
00071       for(SourceAnalPulseMap::const_iterator sourceIt2 = gAnalysedPulseMap.begin(); sourceIt2 != gAnalysedPulseMap.end(); sourceIt2++)
00072         {
00073           if(sourceIt2->first.Channel() != fDetNameB)
00074             continue;  //check for detector B
00075           if(sourceIt2->first.Generator() != sourceIt->first.Generator())
00076             continue;  //make sure they have the same generator
00077 
00078 
00079  
00080           //I should make a vector of the sources for detA and detB
00081           fDetASources.push_back(sourceIt->first);
00082           fDetBSources.push_back(sourceIt2->first);
00083 
00084 
00085 
00086         }
00087     }
00088   return 0;
00089 }
00090 
00091 // Called once for each event in the main event loop
00092 // Return non-zero to indicate a problem and terminate the event loop
00093 int PlotTDiff::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData* gData,const TSetupData *setup){
00094 
00095   for(SourceVector::const_iterator sourceIt = fDetASources.begin(); sourceIt != fDetASources.end(); sourceIt++)
00096     {
00097       const AnalysedPulseList& detAPulses = gAnalysedPulseMap[*sourceIt];
00098 
00099       //check for GetTime.
00100       AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator pulseIt = detAPulses.begin();
00101       pulseIt++;
00102       if((*pulseIt)->GetTime() == definitions::DefaultValue)      
00103         continue;
00104 
00105 
00106       //Get DetB pulses for the same Generator
00107       for(SourceVector::const_iterator sourceIt2 = fDetBSources.begin(); sourceIt2 != fDetBSources.end(); sourceIt2++)
00108         if((*sourceIt2).Generator() == (*sourceIt).Generator())
00109           {
00110             const AnalysedPulseList& detBPulses = gAnalysedPulseMap[*sourceIt2];
00111 
00112 
00113             //now I should build my histograms, need some keyname(source1?)
00114             //std::string keyname = sourceIt;
00115             std::string keyname =  sourceIt->str();
00116 
00117             int nBits = setup->GetNBits(setup->GetBankName(fDetNameA));
00118             int maxAmpA = std::pow(2, nBits);
00119 
00120             nBits = setup->GetNBits(setup->GetBankName(fDetNameB));
00121             int maxAmpB = std::pow(2, nBits);
00122 
00123             //if histogram does not exist, make histograms (amp and/or int, or 1D)
00124             if((ampA_plots.find(keyname) == ampA_plots.end()) && ((*pulseIt)->GetAmplitude() != definitions::DefaultValue))
00125               {
00126                 //ampA plots
00127                 std::string histname = "h" + fDetNameB + "_" + keyname + "TDiff_AmpA";
00128                 std::string histtitle = "Amplitude of " + fDetNameA + " vs time difference with " + fDetNameB + " detectors with the " + (*sourceIt).Generator().str() + " generator";
00129                 TH2F* AAplots = new TH2F(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 1000, -10000, 10000, maxAmpA, 0, maxAmpA);
00130                 AAplots->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Time Difference (ns)");
00131                 AAplots->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Amplitude (ADC counts)");
00132                 ampA_plots[keyname] = AAplots;
00133             
00134 
00135                 //ampB plots
00136                 histname = "h" + fDetNameB + "_" + keyname + " TDiff_AmpB";
00137                 histtitle = "Amplitude of " + fDetNameB + " vs time difference with " + fDetNameA + " detectors with the " + (*sourceIt).Generator().str() + " generator";
00138                 TH2F* ABplots = new TH2F(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 1000, -10000, 10000, maxAmpB, 0, maxAmpB);
00139                 ABplots->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Time Difference (ns)");
00140                 ABplots->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Amplitude (ADC counts)");
00141                 ampB_plots[keyname] = ABplots;
00142 
00143               }
00144 
00145             if((intA_plots.find(keyname) == intA_plots.end()) && ((*pulseIt)->GetIntegral() != definitions::DefaultValue))
00146               {
00147                 //intA plots
00148                 std::string histname = "h" + fDetNameB + "_" + keyname + " TDiff_IntA";
00149                 std::string histtitle = "Integral of " + fDetNameA + " vs time difference with " + fDetNameB + " detectors with the " + (*sourceIt).Generator().str() + " generator";
00150                 TH2F* IAplots = new TH2F(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 1000, -10000, 10000, maxAmpA, 0, 5*maxAmpA);
00151                 IAplots->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Time Difference (ns)");
00152                 IAplots->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Integral (ADC counts)");
00153                 intA_plots[keyname] = IAplots;
00154 
00155                 //intB plots
00156                 histname = "h" + fDetNameB + "_" + keyname + " TDiff_IntB";
00157                 histtitle = "Integral of " + fDetNameB + " vs time difference with " + fDetNameA + " detectors with the " + (*sourceIt).Generator().str() + " generator";
00158                 TH2F* IBplots = new TH2F(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 1000, -10000, 10000, maxAmpB, 0, 5*maxAmpB);
00159                 IBplots->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Time Difference (ns)");
00160                 IBplots->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Integral (ADC counts)");
00161                 intB_plots[keyname] = IBplots;
00162               }
00163 
00164             if(((*pulseIt)->GetIntegral() == definitions::DefaultValue) && ((*pulseIt)->GetAmplitude() == definitions::DefaultValue) && (oned_plots.find(keyname) == oned_plots.end()))
00165               {
00166                 std::string histname = "h" + fDetNameB + "_" + keyname + "TDiff_1D";
00167                 std::string histtitle = "Time difference between  " + fDetNameA + " and " + fDetNameB + " detectors with the " + (*sourceIt).Generator().str() + " generator";
00168                 TH1F* dplots = new TH1F(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 1000, -10000, 10000);
00169                 dplots->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Time Difference (ns)");
00170                 dplots->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Count");
00171                 oned_plots[keyname] = dplots;
00172               }
00173 
00174 
00175             for(AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator pulseIt = detAPulses.begin(); pulseIt != detAPulses.end(); pulseIt++)
00176               {
00177 
00178                 for(AnalysedPulseList::const_iterator pulseIt2 = detBPulses.begin(); pulseIt2 != detBPulses.end(); pulseIt2++)
00179                   {
00180                     double timeA = (*pulseIt)->GetTime(), timeB = (*pulseIt2)->GetTime();
00181                     double tDiff = timeA - timeB;
00182 
00183                     double ampA = (*pulseIt)->GetAmplitude(), ampB = (*pulseIt2)->GetAmplitude();
00184 
00185                     double intA = (*pulseIt)->GetIntegral(), intB = (*pulseIt2)->GetIntegral();
00186 
00187 
00188                     if(ampA != definitions::DefaultValue)
00189                       {
00190                         ampA_plots[keyname]->Fill(tDiff, ampA);
00191                         ampB_plots[keyname]->Fill(-tDiff, ampB);
00192                       }
00193               
00194                     if(intA != definitions::DefaultValue)
00195                       {
00196                         intA_plots[keyname]->Fill(tDiff, intA);
00197                         intB_plots[keyname]->Fill(-tDiff, intB);
00198                       }
00199               
00200                     
00201                     if((intA == definitions::DefaultValue) && (ampA ==definitions::DefaultValue))
00202                       oned_plots[keyname]->Fill(tDiff);
00203                     
00204                   }//end detBPulse loop
00205               }//end detAPulse loop
00206           }//end sourceIt2 loop
00207     }//end sourceIt loop
00208 
00209   return 0;
00210 }

00225 // The following macro registers this module to be useable in the config file.
